      • readFiletoArray

        protected int readFiletoArray(java.lang.String filename)
                       throws java.lang.Error
        This function read a file to arraylist.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file name of the file that reading into arraylist.
        Returns:
        1 when successful , -1 when file empty.(after first line)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Error - when any error showed up.

        Returns:
